Name: Poppy Toast
About the game: Poppy Toast is an Action Arcade game about escaping the notorious Razzle HQ and bringing Poppy Toast to the world whilst avoiding Razzle's advanced block defence system. Experience fast-paced toasty clicking action to make poppy toast pop up and between the Razzle Blocks! Earn points for every obstacle that you avoid and unlock new toast skins to escape with! The more points you accumulate, the more RGB there is. RGB is love, RGB is life. See how far you can get and be hailed a hero! This game is of course inspired by a familiar flapping bird.
